publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2958 Mr Andy Kerr: Sexual Health—That the Parliament acknowledges the progress that has been made to date in implementing Respect and Responsibility, the Scottish Executive’s Strategy and Action Plan for Improving Sexual Health; commends the work by stakeholders to date, and welcomes the creation of a National Sexual Health Advisory Committee which will be a key element in taking forward the action plan. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
